A. About 500 m² (very small - maybe 1-2 tennis courts)
B. About 1500 m² (small - maybe a few tennis/basketball courts)
C. About 3500 m² (medium - could be a small football field or multiple courts)
D. About 80119 m² (very large - multiple full-sized football fields)

For a "regional sports infrastructure audit," we would typically be looking at multiple facilities. Option D (80,119 m²) seems too large for a single image analysis. Option C (3,500 m²) would be reasonable for a medium-sized sports complex with multiple facilities.

Based on typical sports infrastructure sizes and the context of a regional audit, the most reasonable estimate would be:

<Answer>C</Answer>
